00039 /*
00040 typedef union {
00041   struct {
00042     l4_umword_t prio     :8;
00043     l4_umword_t small    :8;
00044     l4_umword_t state    :4;
00045     l4_umword_t time_exp :4;
00046     l4_umword_t time_man :8;
00047   } sp;
00048   l4_umword_t sched_param;
00049   l4_umword_t raw;
00050 } l4_sched_param_t;
00051 
00052 #define L4_INVALID_SCHED_PARAM ((l4_sched_param_t){raw:(l4_umword_t)-1})
00053 */
00054 
00055 /* Compute l4_sched_param_struct_t->small argument for
00056    l4_thread_schedule(): size_mb is the size of all small address
00057    spaces, and nr is the number of the small address space.  See
00058    Liedtke: ``L4 Pentium implementation'' */
00059 //#define L4_SMALL_SPACE(size_mb, nr) ((size_mb >> 2) + nr * (size_mb >> 1))
00060 
00061 /*
00062  * Some useful operations and test functions for id's and types
00063  */
00064

00074 }
00075 */
